exception.seleccionar_fila: You must select a distributor from the grid.
exception.distribuidor_no_encontrado: No distributor was found in the database with that CUIT.
exception.cuit_invalido: The entered CUIT is not valid. The format must be: xx-xxxxxxxx-x.
exception.cuit_ya_registrado: The entered CUIT is already assigned to another distributor.
exception.apellido_con_numeros: The last name cannot contain numbers.
exception.dni_no_valido: The DNI does not meet the format (8 digits).
exception.dni_en_uso: The DNI is already in use.
exception.email_no_valido: The email format is not valid.
exception.telefono_no_valido:
The phone number format is not valid.
 Expected format: 011 1234-5678
exception.sin_cambios: The distributor cannot be modified because there are no changes in the entered data.

mensaje.modificacion_exito: The selected distributor was updated successfully.
mensaje.eliminacion_exito: The selected distributor was deleted successfully.
